record.dc:title: Miss Langmaid, Evelyn, and Emily
record.dc:description: Miss Abbie Langmaid, Chairman of the Settlement School Committee, Evelyn Bishop, Head Resident of the Settlement School, and Emily Burton, teacher of primary grades. Photo taken in front of Teachers' Cottage. Pollard Cottage is visible in the background.
